s: Back when this first happened I sent a message to PIRIT via their website. I received no response. I've been using my 99 dollar hose for two years since then and it has worked flawlessly. ... Under no circumstances should you buy this hose. Bought 3. None of the three lasted more than a month. Walked out today and found the hose frozen solid. Junk hoses. Try a different brand. ... Hose has been going strong for over 5 years so far. No leaks and heats ...
